content: DK Core is released and accessible at https://hl7.dk/fhir/core/ - the first technically available version is 1.1.0
A followup release is on its way -> v1.1.1 due to a bug found here: https://github.com/hl7dk/dk-core/commit/1588679f1e78689290094c3c1e65eb58638a1b27
(@Grahame Grieve any chance you'll have a look at https://github.com/hapifhir/org.hl7.fhir.core/issues/703)
